Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Kade vi nahim, besaka papi'am da amalanama sijina (naraka da ika bhaga) vica hovega
Ate tusim ki samajho ki sijina ki hai
Iha ika likhi'a ho'i'a dafatara hai
Usa dina inakara karana vali'am la'i vinasa hai
Jihare inasafa de dina tom inakara karade hana
Ate usa tom uha hi bada inakara karada hai, jihara hadam da ulaghana karana vala hove, papi hove
Jadom iha pichali'am (ho cuki'am) di'am kahani'am hana
Kade vi nahim, sagom unham de dilam te unham de karamam da zaga carha gi'a
Kade vi nahim, sagom usa dina uha apane raba valom ita vica rakho janage
Phira uha naraka vica dakhila honage
Phira akhi'a javega ki uha ciza hai, jisa nu tusim jhuthala'unde si
Kade vi nahim, besaka neka lokam da karama patara (amala) iliyi (neka lokam de amala rakhana di tham) vica hana
Ate tusim ki jano ki iliyi ki hai
Likhi'a ho'i'a dafatara hai
Jisa de nazadika uca kauti de farisate hazira rahide hana
Besaka neka loka arama vica honage
Uha takhatam te baithe dekhade honage
Unham de cihari'am vica tusim arama di tazagi mahisusa karoge
Unham nu sudha mohara bada saraba pila'i'a javega
Jisa te musaka di mohara hovegi. Ate iha ciza hai jisa di kamana karana vali'am nu kamana karani cahidi hai
Ate usa saraba vica tasanima (janata di ika nahira) di milavata hovegi
Ika ajiha jharana jisa vicom (alaha de) nazadiki loka pinage
Besaka jihare loka aparadhi sana, uha imana vali'am te hasade sana
Ate jadom uha unham de sahamani'o laghade hana, tam uha apisa vica akham de isare karade sana
Ate jadom uha apane lokam vica vapisa a'unde hana tam maujam karade a'unde hana
Ate jadom uha unham nu dekhade hana, tam akhade hana ki iha bhatake ho'e loka hana
Jadom ki uha unham te pahiredara bana ke nahim bheje ga'e sana
So aja imana vale avagi'akari'am te hasade honage
